nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:book","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Book of Progression\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"This book, imbued with great\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"power, upgrades as you do.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"A wise novel once thought to\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"be the cure to all problems.\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Click to select modifiers!\",\"color\":\"yellow\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"* \",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"bold\":true},{\"text\":\"Soulbound \",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"},{\"text\":\"*\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"bold\":true}]}","{\"text\":\"LEGENDARY ACCESSORY\",\"color\":\"gold\",\"bold\":true}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"id":"BOOK_OF_PROGRESSION","upgradedRarity":"LEGENDARY"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{}}}
